properties.name: Total Encumbrance
properties.author: bmos (Wil Thieme)
properties.description: rThis extension applies encumbrance penalties, rolls spell failure chances, weighs PC coins, calculates character wealth, offers metric unit conversion, and recalculates carrying capacity taking into account STR effects and Ant Haul.
